name: Purgatory Paperwork
description:
Buck has died suddenly, and has found himself in purgatory. He was neither bad, nor extremely good either. He was exactly dead center, which lands him in purgatory as well as a meeting with the Grim Reaper. Because he was so unique, the Grim Reaper offers him a chance at reincarnation. If Buck is able to battle his way out, and prove himself, then he may be rewarded with a second chance at life.

Wait for dialog to finish and give a second or two after it finishes to keep up with checks
